casebody.data:
Johnnie M. DARDEN, Sr.
v.
DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY No. 437P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Michael A. Jones, Attorney at Law, Durham, For Darden, Johnnie M. Tammera S. Hill, Assistant Attorney General, For Department of Public Safety.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 2nd of December 2016 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
